title: A look at Mark Cavendish and his special-edition Nike cycling shoes in the Tour de France
content:
The Manx Missile is wearing special-edition Nike cycling shoes with a gold finish and Hermes wings in the 2023 Tour de France.

Read the full article at A look at Mark Cavendish and his special-edition Nike cycling shoes in the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
